channel.title: 317 cache help?
channel.description:
Since I don't have the required means to turn my client into a webclient, I was thinking of an alternative solution.
Is there a way I could make this occur : 1. Force the client to download cache into C:/ directory. 2. Client will request cache from the directory specified ( the c: drive ) everytime.
Essentially what I want to do is make that occur ^ and then compress my client into its jar format. When people would download my jar it would download the cache into their C:/ directory when they ran the jar. Then everytime the jar would start up after that, it would see if ive made any updates to the cache and re-download it. Of course I also need it to access the cache from C:/ and nowhere else.
If anyone knows what files I would need to alter and how to alter them, it would be a great help.
